title: Strategies for Teacher Professional Development Through School Principals’ Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: School leadership development program for strengthening in-company teacher capabilities in mathematics education

learning_goals: Explain at least three strategies for principals’ support of teacher professional development (PD)
Develop an action plan for building sustainable teacher learning communities
Design a Q methodology-based feedback process that promotes collaborative growth among teachers
Conduct teacher needs analysis using focus group interview techniques
Propose a school-level implementation roadmap for mathematics teaching expertise development
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
